summary: A dataset wrapper that loads audio‑text pairs from HuggingFace collections, extracts the specified fields, applies optional audio augmentation, silence trimming, channel selection, RMS normalization, and text normalization or symbol filtering, then formats the data with BOS/EOS/PAD token IDs (and optional sample IDs) for consumption by NeMo speech‑recognition models.
business_intent: Enable seamless integration of public HuggingFace speech datasets into NeMo training pipelines, reducing engineering effort for preparing audio and transcript inputs for ASR model development.
